Destructor still in his lion mode blind side Nightlind and tackles her. 
Trying to rip his claws into her.
 Galvatron tranformes into his robot mode.  He hovered silently towards the 
battle field.

--part1_ac.29b2e3ff.2a5535f8_boundary
